headline.main: Federal Authorities Investigate Theft of Explosives From CSX Train

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: An undisclosed quantity of commercial fireworks, classified as explosives, were taken from a train that arrived in Detroit on Wednesday, a company spokesman said.
lead_paragraph: An undisclosed quantity of commercial fireworks, classified as explosives, were taken from a train that arrived in Detroit on Wednesday, a company spokesman said.
